file_content.text: Your skills are impressive, Commander. It is good to know your reputation is not exaggerated.
That crash was no accident.
Someone wants us dead.
My vessel was sabotaged.
Probably the same person jamming our comm signals.
Lorman's behind this. I know it.
This is the minister's doing.
Lorman lacks both the courage and competence to orchestrate a direct attempt on my life.
My shuttle has an emergency beacon. The signal should cut through any interference. If help is coming, that's where they'll be.
Just about into the main network...
Someone's coming.
Forgive the intrusion, but I come bearing tragic news. The Empress's shuttle has crashed.
Crashed? Where?
Somewhere in the jungle. Unfortunately, the emergency locator is not transmitting.
That's--that's impossible.
Not if the shuttle disintegrated. I'm afraid there's only one logical conclusion: the Empress and Commander are dead.
Give me one reason I shouldn't kill you here and now.
You betrayed me.
You handle yourself well in a fight.
Not bad yourself.
We both nearly died in that crash. I wouldn't put myself in such danger.
If you wanted to get me all alone in the wilderness, you could've just asked.
[Flirt] Did you plan this?
If I find out you arranged this...
You'd better be innocent.
I am aware of the consequences, and I promise you, I am not behind it... but I am eager to learn who is.
Normally, I arrange a more romantic setting for my crashes.
I can pilot a shuttle too... unless someone sabotages it.
